title: Lightfoot Halfling
content:

Lightfoot Halfling

Base Racial Speed Brave Lucky

Naturally Stealthy.

Lightfoot Halfling is a Subrace of Halflings in Baldur's Gate 3. Lightfoot Halfling is a nimble race and is skilled at concealment. Each of them has their special characteristics and some of them have Sub-Races which provide different Features and Traits.

BG3 Full Game Note: In the full launch of Baldur's Gate 3, Ability Score Points for Races that were present in Early Access are removed. And instead, Ability Score Points in the full game correspond with the Class players will choose.

Lightfoot halflings are stealthy but social, traveling all over Faerun to make names for themselves.

Lightfoot Halfling Traits:

Naturally Stealthy: Your nimble nature makes you skilled at concealment. You have advantage on Stealth checks.

Halfling Features

Lucky: When you roll a 1 for an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

Lightfoot Halfling Tips & Notes

During Early Access, the Lightfood Halfling race used to feature +2 Dexterity and +1 Charisma. This has been changed in the full launch of BG3 and the Ability Score points are now associated with the Class that players will choose. ?? ??
